history.proof: simpl. intros H. inversion H. shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
fixed_nodes: seq nid
to: nid
this: nid
d: dstatelet
msg: Equality.sort (seq_eqType nat_eqType)
pf: greet_safe this to d msg
b: heap

Goal:
Some b = greet_step pf -> coh {| dstate := upd this b (dstate d); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup d) {| content := {| tag := greet_tag; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |}

Premises:
dsoup = fun d : dstatelet => let (_, dsoup) := d in dsoup : dstatelet -> soup
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
post_msg = fun (s : soup) (m : msg TaggedMessage) => (s \+ fresh s \\-> m, fresh s) : soup -> msg TaggedMessage -> soup * mid
greet_safe = fun (this n : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType) => [/\ this \in fixed_nodes, n \in fixed_nodes, exists m : nat, msg == m :: hello & coh d] : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq_eqType nat_eqType -> Prop
from : forall mtype : Type, State.msg mtype -> nat
Notation seq := list
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
Notation heap := Heap.heap
Inductive bool : Set := true : bool | false : bool
seq_eqType = fun T : eqType => EqType (seq T) (seq_eqMixin T) : eqType -> eqType
tms_cont = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (_, tms_cont) := t in tms_cont : TaggedMessage -> seq nat tms_cont is a coercion
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
active : forall mtype : Type, State.msg mtype -> bool
Notation coh := GreeterCoh
nat_eqType = EqType nat nat_eqMixin : eqType
greet_tag = 0 : nat
dstate = fun d : dstatelet => let (dstate, _) := d in dstate : dstatelet -> lstate_type heap
nid = nat : Set
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
greet_step : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), greet_safe this to d msg -> option heap
content : forall mtype : Type, State.msg mtype -> mtype
upd : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type) (cT : union_map_class K V), K -> V -> cT -> cT
SendMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 -> forall S : send_safe st this to (getStatelet s1 l) msg, all_hooks_fire w l (t_snd st) s1 this msg to -> Some b = send_step S -> s2 = upd l {| dstate := upd this b (dstate (getStatelet s1 l)); dsoup := (post_msg (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) {| content := {| tag := t_snd st; tms_cont := msg |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |}).1 |} s1 -> network_step w this s1 s2
network_step_ind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : Prop), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
network_step_sind : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (P : SProp), (s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> P) ->...-> P
rely_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
rely_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
rely_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat), network_rely w this s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
step_send_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b -> b')
step_send_other' : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (to : nat) (b : bool) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b |} -> exists b' : bool, find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := this; to := to; active := b' |} /\ (b' -> b)
Inductive network_step (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) : Prop := Idle : s1 \In Coh w /\ s1 = s2 -> network_step w this s1 s2 | SendMsg : forall (l : Label) (st : send_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), st \In get_st w l -> forall (to : nid) (msg : seq nat) (b : heap), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> l \in dom s1 -> Coh w s1 ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2 Arguments Idle [w] _ [s1 s2] Arguments SendMsg [w this s1 s2 l st] _ [to] [msg]%seq_scope [b] _ _ _ [S] Arguments ReceiveMsg [w this s1 s2 l rt] _ [i] [from]%nat_scope [pf] _ [C msg0]
step_consume_other : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (l : Label) (s s' : state) (m : mid) (tm : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (z : nat_eqType), this != z -> network_step w z s s' -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |} -> find m (dsoup (getStatelet s' l)) = Some {| content := tm; from := from; to := this; active := true |}
ReceiveMsg : forall (w : world) (this : nid) (s1 s2 : state) (l : Label) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol w l))), rt \In get_rt w l -> forall (i : mid) (from : nat) (pf : this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s1 l)), l \in dom s1 -> forall (C : Coh w s1) (msg0 : TaggedMessage), tag msg0 = t_rcv rt ->...-> network_step w this s1 s2
Actions.tryrecv_act_step = fun (W : world) (this : nid) (filter : Label -> nid -> nat -> pred (seq nat)) (s1 s2 : state) (r : option (nid * nat * seq nat)) => exists pf : s1 \In Coh W, [/\ forall (l : Label) (m : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (from : nat) (rt : receive_trans (Protocols.coh (getProtocol W l))) (b : bool), this \in Protocols.Exports.nodes (getProtocol W l) (getStatelet s1 l) -> Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := this; active := b |} = find m (dsoup (getStatelet s1 l)) -> rt \In rcv_trans (getProtocol W l) -> tag tms = t_rcv rt -> msg_wf rt (coh_s l pf) this from tms -> filter l from (t_rcv rt) tms ->...-> Prop Arguments Actions.tryrecv_act_step _ _ _%function_scope
locE' : forall (d : dstatelet) (n : nid) (x : heap) (y : soup), valid (dstate d) -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n x (dstate d); dsoup := y |} = x
getLocalU : forall (n : nid) (m : [ordType of nid]) (d : dstatelet) (s : soup), valid (dstate d) -> m \in dom (dstate d) -> getLocal n d = getLocal n {| dstate := upd m (getLocal m d) (dstate d); dsoup := s |}
locU : forall (n n' : nat_eqType) (x : heap) (st : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC nat_ordType heap)) (s : soup), n != n' -> valid st -> getLocal n {| dstate := upd n' x st; dsoup := s |} = getLocal n {| dstate := st; dsoup := s |}
empty_dstatelet = {| dstate := empty_lstate [::]; dsoup := Unit |} : dstatelet
Mem_map_inv : ?x \In [seq ?f i | i <- ?s] ->...-> ?T'] ?x : [fixed_nodes : seq nid this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType pf : greet_safe this to d msg b : heap |- ?T'] ?s : [fixed_nodes : seq nid this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType pf : greet_safe this to d msg b : heap |- seq ?T]
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [fixed_nodes : seq nid this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType pf : greet_safe this to d msg b : heap |- Type] ?P : [fixed_nodes : seq nid this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType pf : greet_safe this to d msg b : heap |- ?A -> Type]
greet_safe_def : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType), greet_safe this to d msg < -> (exists (b : heap) (pf : greet_safe this to d msg), greet_step pf = Some b)
locE : forall (i : union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) (n : nid) (k : Label) (x : heap) (y : soup), k \in dom i -> valid i -> valid (dstate (getStatelet i k)) -> getLocal n (getStatelet (upd k {| dstate := upd n x (dstate (getStatelet i k)); dsoup := y |} i) k) = x
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [fixed_nodes : seq nid this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType pf : greet_safe this to d msg b : heap |- Type]
dyn : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A : ?C), interp A -> {x : ?C & interp x} where ?C : [fixed_nodes : seq nid this : nid to : nid d : dstatelet msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType pf : greet_safe this to d msg b : heap |- Type]
prod_ordType = fun K T : ordType => Ordered.Pack {| Ordered.base := prod_eqMixin K T; Ordered.mixin := prod_ordMixin K T |} : ordType -> ordType -> ordType
heapUMC = UMC.Pack {| UMC.p := fun k : ptr_ordType => k != null; UMC.mixin := heapUMCMix |} : union_map_class ptr_ordType (dynamic id)
Record msg (mtype : Type) : Type := Msg { content : mtype; from : nat; to : nat; active : bool } Arguments msg _%type_scope Arguments Msg [mtype]%type_scope _ (_ _)%nat_scope _%bool_scope
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
Transitions.SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
Record mixin_of (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : Pred dstatelet) : Prop := Mixin { _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dstate d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> valid (dsoup d); _ : forall d : dstatelet, coh d -> dom (dstate d) =i nodes d } Arguments Coherence.mixin_of _%function_scope Arguments Coherence.Mixin [nodes]%function_scope [coh] (_ _ _)%function_scope
mem = fun (T : Type) (pT : predType T) => let '{| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} as pT0 := pT return (pT0 -> mem_pred T) in fun A : {| pred_sort := pred_sort0; topred := toP |} => ssrbool.Mem [eta toP A] : forall (T : Type) (pT : predType T), pT -> mem_pred T Arguments mem {T}%type_scope {pT} A : rename, simpl never
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
Equality.sort = fun t : eqType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : eqType -> Type Equality.sort is a coercion
Record dstatelet : Type := DStatelet { dstate : lstate_type heap; dsoup : soup }
this_in_pf : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq_eqType nat_eqType), greet_safe this to d msg -> this \in fixed_nodes
greet_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq_eqType nat_eqType), greet_safe this to d m -> coh d
greet_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq_eqType nat_eqType), greet_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d
Transitions.send_step_t = fun send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop => forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg -> option heap : (nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop) -> Type Arguments Transitions.send_step_t _%function_scope
Inductive heap : Type := Undef : heap | Def : forall finmap : {finMap ptr -> dynamic id}, null \notin supp finmap -> heap Arguments Heap.Def [finmap]
Variant if_spec (A : Type) (b : bool) (vT vF : A) (not_b : Prop) : bool -> A -> Set := IfSpecTrue : b -> if_spec b vT vF not_b true vT | IfSpecFalse : not_b -> if_spec b vT vF not_b false vF Arguments if_spec [A]%type_scope _%bool_scope _ _ _%type_scope _%bool_scope Arguments IfSpecTrue [A]%type_scope [b]%bool_scope _ _ _%type_scope Arguments IfSpecFalse [A]%type_scope _%bool_scope _ _ [not_b]%type_scope
Transitions.s_safe_coh : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (s : Transitions.send_trans coh) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), Transitions.send_safe s this to d m -> coh d
